message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of your product, $950,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to offer $850,000 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. We've considered your offer and would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and allows us to cover our costs while still being competitive in the market. We hope this proposal meets your expectations and enables us to move forward with the transaction.
